1.title: Gina the Smart Steam Engine

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: When Vinnie the big bully engine boasts about being the strongest steam engine, Gina decides to teach him a lesson.

2.title: Frieda the Grumpiest Engine

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: Frieda is jealous because everyone cheers for Ivan and not her. Ivan tells Frieda that she needs to smile and it works. From then on, the big German engine vows to be cheerful all the time.

3.title: Shane Surfs in the Slippery Snow

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: Shane and Yong Bao head into the snowy Himalayan mountains and Shane decides to race down the slippery tracks, but soon runs into trouble.

4.title: Rajiv the Best Decorated Engine

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Rajiv is sad because he thinks no-one is interested in him and the trophy he won for being the best decorated engine in the Great Railway Show, but there might just be a surprise in store for him.

5.title: Carlos Races Raul!

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Raul and Carlos race each other to get the soccer fans to the stadium, but they race to the baseball stadium by mistake.

6.title: Vinnie Is Back in America

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: Tired of his relentless boasting, the little dockyard engines play a trick on big, strong Vinnie.

7.title: Axel Goes to the Mountains

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: Boastful electric engine Etienne is upset when he can't get up into the mountains like Axel. He later learns that steam engines can be as good as electric ones.

8.title: Ashima Helps Rajiv

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

8.plot: Rajiv is afraid of heights, but Ashima helps him up the mountain to see the spectacular view.

9.title: Raul is Back in Brazil

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

9.plot: Raul offers to help the holidaymakers see monkeys, but they are all hiding. Raul has a great idea to tempt the monkeys out of the trees.

10.title: Etienne Visits London

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

10.plot: After the Great Race, Etienne decides to to go to London before returning to France.

11.title: Yong Bao and the Monster in the Tunnel

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

11.plot: There are strange noises coming from a tunnel. Yong Bao goes in to investigate.

12.title: Ivan's Chilly Way Home

episode of.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

12.plot: Ivan is so busy helping two steam engines who have run out of coal that he runs out of diesel fuel in the cold Russian weather.

imdb.title: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far
akas: Thomas & Friends: Great Race Friends Near and Far (United Kingdom)
plot: Not long ago, Thomas the Tank Engine made new friends with engines from all over the world at the Great Railway Show and had a great adventure. Now, Thomas' new friends are headed back home for even more adventures.::Anonymous
